name: get_address
body:
SELECT
  'Name-' || person.first_name || ' ' || person.last_name || ',City-' || address.city || ', State-' || address.state || ',Country-' || address.country || ', ZIP Code-' || address.zip_code INTO person_details
FROM
  person_info person,
  person_address address
WHERE
  person.id = person_id
  AND address.person_id = person.id;

RETURN(person_details);

grants.script: GRANT EXECUTE ON get_address TO public;

name: fsum

grants.script: GRANT EXECUTE ON fsum TO public;
GRANT DEBUG ON fsum TO user1;

name: fsub

grants.script: GRANT EXECUTE ON fsub TO public;
GRANT DEBUG ON fsub TO user1;
